thread.title: Soap EastEnders is planning a spooktacular Halloween hour-long episode
thread.title_full: Soap | EastEnders is planning a spooktacular Halloween hour-long episode - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Soap EastEnders is planning a spooktacular Halloween hour-long episode
text:
Looks like it's set to be an unmissable Halloween on Albert Square this month, with the soap airing a special hour-long episode, where a number of long-running storylines are said to be coming to a head.
While EastEnders is renowned for their Christmas specials, the last few years they've been upping the drama for Halloween too, with Nick Cotton returning in 2014, and the murder of Michael Moon the previous year.
No word yet on what exactly this bumper episode will focus on, but at the moment a few storylines are simmering away just dying to boil over, including Kathy Beale's return and Gavin's kidnapping of Phil, as well as Dean Wicks' increasingly controlling behaviour over Roxy.
While producer Dominic Treadwell-Collins has previously suggested that Halloween would be a big time for Stacey Branning, who is most certainly carrying Kush's child... right?!
The episode will air Friday 30th at 7:30pm on RTE 1 and BBC1.
